positions.title: Senior Manager - Process Excellence & Corporate Strategy
positions.description_html:
1. Project Manager for Business Process Management initiative for the flagship construction business
Key Responsibilities – Design Phase
• As-Is process mapping & gap analysis for existing processes so as to define new improved processes
• Managing a team of 7 people hand picked for this company wide initiative
• Regular interactions with CXO level executives
• Interacting and discussing with all HODs and regional directors to formalize the improved processes and system
Key Responsibilities – Implementation Phase
• Implementation planning and conducting workshops (involving more than 1000 people at various levels) with the end users to increase usage of processes
• Functional reporting of more than 15 people across 8 regions to do on the ground hand-holding and grass root support

Achievements
• More than 95% implementation status across 8 regions of the company across various processes

2. IT Implementation (SAP)


• Involved in implementation partner selection for SAP implementation
• Core team members for SAP implementation across four business verticals. Involved primarily in setting enterprise level architecture, KPI definition and process flows for SAP PS, MM, FI
